分类.requestInfo: @js:let url = config.host+ "/all" +params.filters.aa+params.filters.ab+params.filters.ac + ".html?page=" +params.pageIndexlet hh= {  "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_12_6) AppleWebKit/604.3.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0 Safari/604.1"}return {'url':encodeURI(url), 'POST':false, "httpHeaders": config.httpHeaders,forbidCookie:true,};
